attributes.action: Allow Personal Defense Weapons in the U.K
attributes.additional_details:
5521 cases of household violence was recorded across Britain last year; and there was 2029 cases of attempted burglary. Of those only 286 out of 2029 were stopped on attempt.

So we can all see that there is a direct issue of burglary in the U.K so surely it must be in the Governments good intentions to help prevent all these shocking statistics.

So please do help stop this terrible crime from; not just Burglary's, but from our own government aswell.
